All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Boat
This class represents a specific implementation of a boat used in the Naval Battle game.
BoatAdapter
Abstract base class that implements the IBoat interface and provides default behaviors and properties for different types of boats used in the Battleship-style game.
GameController
Controller class for the main game view.
GameControllerAdapter
Abstract adapter class that implements the IGameController interface.
GameState
Concrete implementation of GameStateAdapter that initializes the game state with a given list of logic boards.
GameStateAdapter
Abstract base class that implements the IGameState interface and provides basic support for managing game boards.
IBoat
Interface that defines the structure and behavior of a boat used in a Battleship-style game.
IGameController
Interface for the main game controller.
IGameState
Interface that defines the structure for accessing the current state of the game.
IInstructionsController
Interface for the Instructions view controller.
ILogicBoard
Interface that defines the core logic for a Battleship-style board.
InstructionsController
Concrete implementation of the instructions view controller.
InstructionsControllerAdapter
Abstract class that serves as an adapter for the Instructions view controller.
IPlainTextFileHandler
Interface that defines basic operations for handling plain text files.
IPlayer
Class who defines the Player of the battleship game with his methods
IPreparationViewController
Interface for the Preparation View Controller in the Battleship game.
ISerializableFileHandler
Interface which Handles object serialization and deserialization using Java's native serialization mechanism.
IStartViewController
Interface for the Start View Controller of the Battleship game.
LogicBoard
LogicBoard represents the main logic structure of the game board.
LogicBoardAdapter
Abstract implementation of the ILogicBoard interface.
Main
 
PlainTextFileHandler
Class who manage the plain text serialization
Player
Class who inherits PlayerAdapter with a constructor
PlayerAdapter
Abstract adapter class that partially implements the IPlayer interface.
PreparationViewController
Controller class for the preparation view of the Battleship game.
PreparationViewControllerAdapter
Abstract controller class for the Preparation View in the Battleship game.
SerializableFileHandler
Handles object serialization and deserialization using Java's native serialization mechanism.
StartStage
 
StartViewController
Controller class for the Start View of the Battleship game.
StartViewControllerAdapter
Abstract controller class for the start view of the Battleship game.
